description.en: Advanced Alien Blaster. The sound of a bell is heard each time it is used.

description.en: Collect all Oracles for discount on new Lord Hexron Hamster

description.en: You didn’t ask for it, but it found you anyway. Wrapped in dust and mystery, this enchanted relic mines with strange, generous power.
description.cn: You didn’t ask for it, but it found you anyway. Wrapped in dust and mystery, this enchanted relic mines with strange, generous power.

description.pt: You didn’t ask for it, but it found you anyway. Wrapped in dust and mystery, this enchanted relic mines with strange, generous power.

description.en: Bask in the radiant glow of Festive Rack 8, where the holiday lights weave a dazzling tapestry of joy
description.cn: Bask in the radiant glow of Festive Rack 8, where the holiday lights weave a dazzling tapestry of joy

description.en: Blaze through the crypto cosmos with RedSpace, a miner fueled by the fiery energy of the red horizon. Cutting through the blockchain with unstoppable force, it transforms every block into a burst of wealth, lighting up the dark void with the glow of success.

description.en: An advanced mining rack that supports 8 miners, featuring eco-friendly materials and design principles to promote sustainable mining practices.
description.cn: An advanced mining rack that supports 8 miners, featuring eco-friendly materials and design principles to promote sustainable mining practices.

description.en: Venture deep into the bear market with BearHole, a miner that thrives where others hesitate. It digs through the toughest blocks, turning the cold, quiet downturns of the crypto winter into hidden treasures waiting to be uncovered.
